articles.author: Jack Denton
articles.title: Stocks fall across Europe and Nasdaq futures tumble 1%, as inflation concerns and selloff sentiment spread - MarketWatch
articles.description: Miners and major oil companies lead the charge into the red, alongside tech and travel stocks
articles.content:
Stocks fell across Europe on Tuesday as Nasdaq futures tumbled more than 1%, with rising U.S. inflation concerns spooking investor sentiment. The pan-European Stoxx 600 
 SXXP,
 -2.24%
slipped 2%,… [+3567 chars]

articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: EU willing to give AstraZeneca more time for deliveries - RTE.ie
articles.description: The European Union is willing to see its Covid-19 vaccine contract with AstraZeneca fulfilled three months later than agreed, providing the company delivers 120 million doses by the end of June, a lawyer representing the bloc said today.
